game.name: Trine 5: A Clockwork Conspiracy
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Trine 시리즈가 거대한 모험과 함께 돌아왔습니다! 다섯 번째 모험에서 Trine의 영웅들은 왕국을 장악하기 위해 어떤 일도 서슴지 않는 악랄하고 이중적인 악당들과 맞붙습니다. Trine의 세계를 구하려면 시간이 촉박해요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Trine series is back with its biggest adventure! In their fifth outing, the Heroes of Trine are pitted against dastardly and duplicitous villains, who will stop at nothing to seize control of the kingdom. The clock is ticking to save the world of Trine!
